value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard
value.excerpt: In this video, I show how you can configure Reporting Services to integrate with Power BI and then pin visualizations from a paginated report to a Power BI dashboard.   There are three main steps you have to do to get this to work.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
value.excerpt: With the release of Microsoft SQL Server 2016, I look at how Reporting Services and Power BI work together. value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Best kept SECRET in Power BI??? You tell us!
value.excerpt: Have we found the best kept SECRET in Power BI? Adam saw this recently and was BLOWN away! Zooming in can help with presenting in business settings and anywhere else. Here are a few things you can use to make that presentation better with Power BI.  ZoomIt:  https://docs.microsoft.com/sysinternals/downloads/zoomit
